channel.title: Squeeler.app Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description:
Version 1.3

  • You can now choose applications to ignore.

Version 1.2.2

  • Fixed size of version field in about dialog

Version 1.2.1

  • Added link to homepage in about dialog

Version 1.2

  • Added Recent Hogs menu

Version 1.1

  • Status bar icon turns yellow when there's been an alert
  • Proper retina images

Version 1.0

  • Initial release
